name: Monologue's Reflection
description:
( Made for GMTK Game Jam 2020 - Theme: Out of Control )

[Status: Unfinished (incomplete subtitles) but Playable]

A mind reflects about a game that is out of control of the player...

Hi, I'm Monologue. Tell me, do you like to reflect on things?

This time, I'll reflect on a game that is out of control.

... Care to join me?
